message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I'm happy to negotiate further. $10,500 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This reflects the value of the product and gives us both a fair deal. Let me know if you're interested!
